text: Su Yu-chang (; â€“ ) was a Chinese martial artist, scholar and physician. He spent his life teaching Kung Fu, traditional Chinese philosophy and medicine all over the world. He was born in Dongshan, Taiwan. Su died at a hospital in La Palma, Canary Islands, Spain on 29 April 2019, aged 78.Spanish obituary. ==References== ==Other websites== * Memorial page at Wutan Alaska. * Main English-language page of Pachi Tanglang International.
